text: this is the riffle maker using the rifle
maker we allow any coffee serving
location to print on top of the foam any
text or image they want the process is
very simple using the app you can find
ripple makers in your neighborhood I
click to create a ripple button I choose
the image I want add photo from the
library there we go and now I click the
reply button it shows me a list of
coffee shops in my neighborhood where I
can pick up my rippled coffee and I
confirm it and now the image is sent
from the phone to the appropriate device
at the coffee shop take my cup of coffee
put it under the machine and ripple it
the machine works using the coffee pod
and the actual drawing is done with
coffee extract and here we go what we
have here is the back inside a logo that
was created using the coffee ripples app
